summary:
Experienced commercial leader with a proven track record in driving exponential growth for digital products. My passion lies in building and nurturing strategic partnerships that fuel revenue growth and enhance profitability. With a strong background in leading cross-functional teams and implementing effective go-to-market strategies, I am recognized for my ability to coach and develop teams to consistently deliver exceptional results.

As the leading food delivery company in Belgium we connect thousands of restaurants with millions of consumers. My team of entrepreneurial and passionate sales people works hard every day in order to build the delivery company for consumers and partners.
